mapper.sql: id, username, password, salt, email, type, status, activation_code, header_url, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into user(username, password, salt, email, type, status, activation_code, header_url, create_time) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{email}, #{type}, #{status}, #{activationCode}, #{headerUrl}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: update user set status = #{status} where id = #{id};
update user set header_url = #{headerUrl} where id = #{id};
update user set password = #{password} where id = #{id};
